item.title: 澳大利亚贸易部长表示，中国葡萄酒争端可能在几周内得到解决
item.description: A trade dispute with China over tariffs on Australian wine may be resolved "in a few weeks' time", Australian Trade Minister Don Farrell said on Tuesday, removing one of the final obstacles curbing its exports to China.翻译:澳大利亚贸易部长唐·法雷尔周二表示，与中国有关澳大利亚葡萄酒关税的贸易争端可能“在几周内”得到解决，从而消除了限制其对华出口的最后障碍之一。
item.author: Alasdair Pal

item.title: 越南计划进行工会改革以避免贸易困境，但冒着外国公司不安的风险
item.description: Communist-ruled Vietnam is expected to ratify this year the UN convention for the free establishment of trade unions, UN officials and diplomats said, in a move meant to cut risks of trade disputes but likely leaving some foreign companies uneasy.翻译:联合国官员和外交官表示，共产党统治下的越南预计将在今年批准联合国自由建立工会公约，此举旨在降低贸易争端风险，但可能会让一些外国公司感到不安。
item.author: Francesco Guarascio

item.title: 中国商飞将在东南亚5国展示C919、ARJ21飞机
item.description: Chinese state-owned planemaker COMAC will conduct flying displays of its C919 and ARJ21 jets in five Southeast Asian countries, it said on Tuesday, as it looks to lay the groundwork for future international sales.翻译:中国国有飞机制造商中国商飞公司周二表示，将在五个东南亚国家进行C919和ARJ21喷气式飞机的飞行展示​​，为未来的国际销售奠定基础。
item.author: Sophie Yu, Brenda Goh

item.title: 独家：渣打银行暂停中国客户新的离岸渠道投资
item.description: Standard Chartered has suspended new investments by its clients in China into offshore products via a quota-based channel, the bank said, amid a surge in demand for overseas investments due to weakness in the local market and currency.翻译:渣打银行表示，由于当地市场和货币疲软，海外投资需求激增，该行已暂停中国客户通过配额渠道对离岸产品进行新投资。
item.author: Selena Li

item.title: 日本股市飙升让投资者远离陷入困境的中国
item.description: As economic and geopolitical woes spur an exodus of investors from China, many have been redirecting money into Japan, giving the benchmark Nikkei an extra boost as it rockets to all-time highs.翻译:随着经济和地缘政治困境促使投资者大量逃离中国，许多人将资金转移到日本，这给基准日经指数带来了额外的提振，使其飙升至历史新高。
item.author: Brigid Riley

item.title: 日本通胀高于预期，亚洲股市动荡，交易员保持警惕
item.description: Asian shares struggled to advance on Tuesday, with slightly warmer-than-expected Japanese inflation putting investors on guard ahead of price data due in Europe and the U.S. this week.翻译:亚洲股市周二艰难上涨，日本通胀略高于预期，令投资者在本周欧洲和美国公布价格数据之前保持警惕。
item.author: Tom Westbrook

item.title: 台湾称5艘中国海警船进入前线岛屿附近海域
item.description: Five Chinese coast guard ships entered prohibited or restricted waters around Taiwan's frontline islands of Kinmen on Monday but left shortly after being warned away, a Taiwan minister said on Tuesday amid a continued rise in tensions with Beijing.翻译:台湾一位部长周二表示，在与北京的紧张关系持续升级之际，五艘中国海警船周一进入台湾前线金门岛周围的禁区或限制水域，但在被警告离开后不久就离开了。
item.author: Ben Blanchard, Yimou Lee

item.title: 关键数据公布前美元下跌，比特币飙升至 57,000 美元以上
item.description: The dollar traded on the back foot on Tuesday, as markets looked ahead to a week of U.S. economic data that will provide fresh signals on how soon the Federal Reserve may begin cutting interest rates.翻译:周二美元走势不利，因为市场期待一周的美国经济数据，这些数据将提供有关美联储可能多久开始降息的新信号。
item.author: Kevin Buckland

item.title: 夏威夷邻国基里巴斯发现中国警察后美国发出警告
item.description: The United States on Monday cautioned Pacific Islands nations against assistance from Chinese security forces after Reuters reported that Chinese police are working in the remote atoll nation of Kiribati, a neighbor of Hawaii.翻译:在路透社报道中国警察正在夏威夷邻国基里巴斯偏远环礁国家工作后，美国周一警告太平洋岛国不要接受中国安全部队的援助。
item.author: David Brunnstrom, Kirsty Needham

item.title: 中国房地产危机刺激需求，重组专家增加香港员工
item.description: Global restructuring specialists Alvarez & Marsal and Houlihan Lokey have boosted headcount in Hong Kong as China's property crisis results in a surge in debt restructuring deals - making them a rare bright spot in hiring for the city's financial sector.翻译:随着中国的房地产危机导致债务重组交易激增，全球重组专家 Alvarez & Marsal 和 Houlihan Lokey 增加了在香港的员工数量，使其成为香港金融业招聘中罕见的亮点。
item.author: Scott Murdoch, Clare Jim

item.title: 巴西BRF结束七连败，扭亏为盈
item.description: Brazilian poultry and pork processor BRF SA turned a profit of 823 million reais ($165.26 million) in the final three months of 2023, according to an earnings statement on Monday, ending a seven-quarter losing streak.翻译:根据周一的财报，巴西家禽和猪肉加工商 BRF SA 在 2023 年最后三个月实现利润 8.23 亿雷亚尔（1.6526 亿美元），结束了连续七个季度的亏损。
item.author: Ana Mano

item.title: 美国参议院委员会就中国药明康德和华大基因法案举行听证会
item.description: A U.S. Senate committee said on Monday it will hold a hearing on March 6 on a bill that would prohibit federal agencies from contracting with China's BGI, WuXi AppTec and other biotechnology companies of concern.翻译:美国参议院一个委员会周一表示，将于 3 月 6 日就一项禁止联邦机构与中国华大基因、药明康德和其他受关注生物技术公司签订合同的法案举行听证会。
item.author: Karen Freifeld

item.title: 美国称中国航空公司可将美国航班增加至每周 50 班
item.description: Chinese passenger airlines will be allowed to boost their weekly round-trip U.S. flights to 50 starting on March 31, up from the current 35, the U.S. Transportation Department said on Monday, returning the market to nearly one-third of pre-pandemic levels.翻译:美国运输部周一表示，从 3 月 31 日起，中国客运航空公司将被允许将每周往返美国的航班从目前的 35 班增加到 50 班，从而使市场恢复到大流行前水平的近三分之一。
item.author: David Shepardson

item.title: 古巴顶级雪茄制造商因高端需求蓬勃发展而创下销售纪录
item.description: Cuba's top cigar maker Habanos said on Monday its sales had soared to a record $721 million in 2023, a benchmark the company's executives attributed to booming demand for its most luxurious, high-end smokes in markets including China.翻译:古巴顶级雪茄制造商哈伯纳斯周一表示，其2023年销售额已飙升至创纪录的7.21亿美元，该公司高管将这一基准归因于中国等市场对其最豪华、高端雪茄的需求旺盛。
item.author: Dave Sherwood

item.title: 早盘竞价：日本两年来首次通胀低于预期？
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: 国际原子能机构文件称，伊朗浓缩铀库存减少至60%，但问题依然存在
item.description: Iran's stock of uranium enriched to near weapons-grade has shrunk, bringing it below the theoretical threshold at which it could produce three atom bombs, but problems with inspectors persist, reports by the U.N. nuclear watchdog said on Monday.翻译:联合国核监督机构周一的报告称，伊朗的接近武器级的浓缩铀库存已经减少，使其低于可以生产三颗原子弹的理论阈值，但检查人员的问题仍然存在。
item.author: Francois Murphy

item.title: 独家：财政部称美国对银行的警告减缓了俄罗斯的资金流动
item.description: Washington's threat to hit foreign financial institutions with sanctions has made a significant difference in financial flows between Russia and countries such as Turkey, the United Arab Emirates and Kazakhstan, said Deputy Treasury Secretary Wally Adeyemo.翻译:美国财政部副部长沃利·阿德耶莫表示，华盛顿威胁对外国金融机构实施制裁，这对俄罗斯与土耳其、阿拉伯联合酋长国和哈萨克斯坦等国之间的资金流动产生了重大影响。
item.author: Daphne Psaledakis, David Lawder, Andrea Shalal

item.title: 发言人称美国商会会长本周将访华
item.description: The chief executive of the U.S. Chamber of Commerce, Suzanne Clark, is leading a delegation of former U.S. government officials to Beijing this week, the group said.翻译:该组织表示，美国商会首席执行官苏珊·克拉克本周将率领一个由前美国政府官员组成的代表团访问北京。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国在阿布扎比会谈中对美国关税和台湾问题表达“严重”关切
item.description: China's commerce minister Wang Wentao expressed the country's "solemn concerns" over U.S. tariffs and Taiwan-related issues in the economic and trade fields on Monday when meeting with U.S. Trade Representative Katherine Tai.翻译:中国商务部部长王文涛周一在会见美国贸易代表戴凯瑟琳时表达了中国对美国关税和涉台经贸领域问题的“严重关切”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国最新的长征火箭将在创纪录的任务年首次亮相
item.description: China's Long March 12, capable of sending bigger satellites with more functionalities into the Earth's orbit, is expected to make its debut flight in 2024, in a year of record launch missions for the country, state media reported on Monday.翻译:据官方媒体周一报道，中国的长征十二号能够将更大、功能更多的卫星送入地球轨道，预计将于 2024 年首次飞行，今年是中国发射任务创纪录的一年。
item.author: Reuters
